feed.title: Nextcloud Talk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.2
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix: Improve performance of conversation list #14811 #14779 #14777 #14775 #14774 #14831
  • fix: Improve performance when rendering system messages #14817
  • fix: Improve performance when searching for conversations #14734
  • fix(chat): Fix missing reactions on own messages while posting #14695
  • fix(guests): Allow guests to reload the page without re-entering the password #14786
  • fix(federation): Fix calls when federated server receive messages in wrong order #14770
  • fix(calls): Fix call after resuming connection #14737
  • fix(calls): Fix wrongly showing "Missed call" in one-to-one conversations #14833
  • fix(calls): Fix videos in the last row being cut off #14692
  • fix(calls): Prevent screen from turning off during calls #14733
  • fix(settings): Fix initial state of end-to-end-encrypted calls setting #14693
  • fix(events): Automatically confirm the calendar event for the organizer #14762
  • fix(workflows): Adjust workflow registration to new mechanism #14823
  • fix(polls): Hide intermediate results from anonymous polls #14724

What's Changed

* [stable31] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14640 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14660 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.21 to 9.2.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14663 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14662 * build(deps): Bump ua-parser-js from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14661 * [stable31] fix(call): revert hard-fix within conversation navigation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14648 * [stable31] fix: update @nextcloud/vue file imports by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14674 * [stable31] fix: migrate from deprecated OC.dialogs.confirmDestructive by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14691 * [stable31] fix(Grid): fix cropped videos in the last row by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14692 * [stable31] fix(AdminSettings): respect initial state of E2EE setting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14693 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14708 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14710 * [stable31] fix(PollViewer): hide intermediate results from anonymous polls by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14724 * [stable31] fix(messages): fix missing instant reactions for own message by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14695 * [stable31] feat: reduce items rendering in left sidebar search results by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14734 * [stable31] fix(call): prevent screen from turning off during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14733 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14752 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/cdav-library from 1.5.2 to 1.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14751 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.22 to 9.2.23 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14753 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14755 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14759 * [stable31] fix(calls): Fix system message for unanswered call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14761 * [stable31] fix: do not add organizer as attendee and set status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14762 * [stable31] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14737 * [stable31] fix(a11y): provide missing aria-labels to buttons with no visible text by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14768 * [stable31] fix(federation): Heal request order for slow federation connections by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14770 * [stable31] fix(performance): Parse file shares inaccurately to prevent setupFS by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14774 * [stable31] feat(conversations): Allow to not request the last message when getting rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14775 * [stable31] fix(shares): Fix lightweight share condition for CardDAV files by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14777 * [stable31] feat(conversations): do not request last message when in compact mode by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14779 * [stable31] fix: improve string handling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14764 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump nextcloud/vue from 8.23.1 to 8.24.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14781 * [stable31] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14786 * [stable31] ci: Fix guests app branch by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14792 * [stable31] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14790 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14804 * [stable31] fix(chat): Fix preloading the last chat message with the room query by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14811 * [stable31] fix(LeftSidebar): conversation subline hardening by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14819 * [stable31] fix(chat): Don't look for some more hardcoded guests by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14817 * [stable31] fix(Flow): adapt to registration fixes at workflowengine by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14824 * [stable31] fix(performance): Improve performance with many file shares as last m… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14831 * [stable31] fix(chat): Fix end-of-call showing "missed call" sometimes in one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14833 * [stable31] ci: Generate authoritative classmap again by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14843 * [stable31] Release 21.0.2 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14840

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.1...v21.0.2

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.3
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(avatar): Fix regression from library requesting too many status updates #14894
  • fix(chat): Improve regex of todo-list handling also uppercase X #14904
  • fix(federation): Use correct capability to show call-notification setting in federated conversations #14907

What's Changed

* [stable31] feat(one-to-one): Don't invite one-to-one participant before sending … by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14849 * [stable31] test: Fix broken scenario by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14854 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14864 * [stable31] chore: Update coding standard in behat by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14863 * [stable31.0] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.24.0 to 8.25.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14894 * [stable31.0] fix(outOfOffice): show expand button during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14900 * [stable31.0] fix(message): improve regexp for interactive todo items by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14904 * [stable31.0] fix(federation): respect remote capabilities when show "Notify about calls" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14907 * [stable31.0] chore(release): Add changelog for 21.0.3 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14911

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.2...v21.0.3

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.4
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(schedule-meeting): Make sure the other user is in one-to-one when scheduling #14973 #14967
  • fix(schedule-meeting): Improve dialog when scheduling in one-to-one #14923
  • fix(schedule-meeting): Hide schedule meeting from former one-to-one #14923
  • fix(performance): Fix unnecessary user_status requests from avatar component #14932

What's Changed

* [stable31.0] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14932 * [stable31.0] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.25.1 to 8.26.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14942 * [stable31.0] fix(CalendarEventsDialog): adjust UI based on conversation type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14923 * [stable31.0] fix: show schedule meeting invite option for fresh 1-1 conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14973 * [stable31.0] fix(scheduling): Enforce one-to-one participants before scheduling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14967 * [stable31.0] chore(release): Changelog for 21.0.4 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14977

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.3...v21.0.4

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v20.1.7
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(call): Fix missing call notification when SIP dial-in is starting a call #14991
  • fix(chat): Improve regex of todo-list handling also uppercase X #14903
  • fix(one-to-one): Add the other participant when sharing a file in one-to-one #14850
  • fix(performance): Fix unnecessary user_status requests from avatar component #14934

What's Changed

* [stable30] fix(chat): Ensure one-to-one is filled when sharing a file by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14850 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14866 * [stable30] test: Fix broken scenario by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14853 * [stable30] fix(outOfOffice): show expand button during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14901 * [stable30] fix(message): improve regexp for interactive todo items by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14903 * [stable30] fix(federation): respect remote capabilities when show "Notify about calls" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14906 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14956 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14960 * [stable30] fix(sip): Fix SIP dial-in starting a call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14991 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15009 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15011 * [stable30] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14934 * [stable30] fix: Print error code and message for unhandled signaling errors by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15023 * [stable30] Add more information to PeerConnectionAnalyzer logs by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15031 * [stable30] Handle invalid client type when trying to start a recording by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15043 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.23 to 9.2.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15066 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15068 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/moment from 1.3.2 to 1.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15065 * [stable30] fix: throttle participants request instead of debouncing by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15088 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.24 to 9.2.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15125 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.127 to 7.0.128 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15126 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15133 * [stable30] fix(openapi): Remove unused return documentation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15144 * [stable30] chore(tests): Cleanup bootstrap.php to be forward-compatible by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15153 * build(deps): Bump webrtc-adapter from 9.0.1 to 9.0.3 by @dependabot in Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v20.1.6...v20.1.7

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.1.0
entry.content:
Added

  • 📅 Improve handling of event conversations: filtered until close to the meeting, default expiration, tracking of event name and description
  • 👥 Allow adding participants to one-to-one calls creating a new conversation
  • 🍱 Add a Talk Dashboard
  • 📇 Enhance right sidebar in one-to-one conversations with information about the participant
  • 📲 Allow SIP direct dial-in to start a new conversation with an existing Nextcloud account
  • 🖌️ Allow to provide custom images for virtual backgrounds for branding or corporate appearance
  • 🔈 Allow selecting the output device in the media settings
  • ☎️ Administration setting to enable SIP dial-in by default for new conversations
  • 📅 Allow creating instant meetings
  • 🔏 Add sensitive conversations which don't show a chat messages in sublines and notifications
  • 📲 Add option to mark a conversation as important to still receive notifications during "Do not disturb"

Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

What's Changed

* [stable31] feat: emit amount of unread messages to display the badge in Talk Desktop by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14867 * Revert "[stable31] ci: Generate authoritative classmap again" by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14845 * [stable31] fix(Conversation): refactor subname rendering, get rid of v-html by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14870 * [stable31] feat(conversation): Add new API endpoint that allows to provide all s… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14869 * [stable31] feat(conversation): Send switch-to signaling message when creating fr… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14871 * [stable31] feat: allow to create new conversation from one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14872 * [stable31] feat(LeftSidebar): transform filters to chips by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14873 * [stable31] feat(conversations): Add "Important conversations" which still notify… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14879 * [stable31] fix(conversation): Add route for important conversation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14884 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.24.0 to 8.25.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14893 * [stable31] fix(outOfOffice): show expand button during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14899 * [stable31] fix(message): improve regexp for interactive todo items by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14905 * [stable31] fix(federation): respect remote capabilities when show "Notify about calls" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14908 * [stable31] chore(release): Add changelog for 21.0.3 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14912 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14921 * [stable31] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14933 * [stable31] fix(conversations): do not add second participant to extended 1-1 twice by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14938 * [stable31] feat(sip): Allow to enable SIP by default by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14940 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.25.1 to 8.26.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14943 * build(deps): Bump vue-tsc from 2.2.8 to 2.2.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14952 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14957 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14959 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14963 * [stable31] fix(CalendarEventsDialog): adjust UI based on conversation type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14924 * [stable31] fix(scheduling): Enforce one-to-one participants before scheduling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14968 * [stable31] fix: show schedule meeting invite option for fresh 1-1 conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14974 * [stable31] chore(release): Changelog for 21.0.4 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14979 * [stable31] fix(conversation): Fix missing return by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14975 * [stable31] fix(lobby): Allow setting the lobby on event and extended conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14982 * [stable31] feat(calls): Allow to provide branded talk-backgrounds via themes by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14987 * [stable31] test: Fix flaky test conversation order by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14989 * [stable31] feat(sip): Allow adding, removing and importing phone numbers by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14993 * [stable31] feat(sip): Allow the sipbridge to create a conversation with a user for a phone number by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14992 * [stable31] feat(conversations): handle event conversation rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15017 * [stable31] feat(retention): Allow defining a default retention for event and phone conversations by @nickvergessen in fix(events): Don't apply retention before the event happened by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15033 * [stable31] feat: add selector for Audio Output 🔈 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15037 * [stable31] feat(conversations): handle event conversation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15035 * [stable31] feat: make by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15050 * [stable31] chore(release): Changelog for 21.1.0-rc.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15048 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/moment from 1.3.2 to 1.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15057 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.23 to 9.2.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15058 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15067 * [stable31] feat(instant-meetings): Support instant_meeting room object type with… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15073 * [stable31] fix: check if property exists before using getValue by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15078 * [stable31] fix: no user in background jobs and appointment links by @backportbot in Expose retention period for instant meetings by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15087 * [stable31] feat(RightSidebar): show mutualEvents in 1-1 conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15097 * [stable31] fix(RightSidebar): better error handling for user profile by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15099 * [stable31] by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15101 * [stable31] feat(sharing): Allow richdocuments to hide-download for public talk share links by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15117 * [stable31] chore: Fix typo in changelog by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15129 * [stable31] fix(RightSidebar): make local setting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15111 * [stable31] fix(i18n): Adapted grammar by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15147 * [stable31] chore(tests): Cleanup bootstrap.php to be forward-compatible by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15154 * [stable31] fix(ConversationActionsShortcut): hide component if nothing
